# Bio
Clarissa is a certified arborist with expertise in urban forestry nonprofit management. She is currently a part of the inaugural cohort of the Master of Environmental Data Science program at the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management. She enjoys talking about her cross-eyed cat, swapping delicious baking recipes, and thinking about how people interact with built and wild environments.
